title: Street
description: Candid street photography from cities across the UK and Europe. Observations of everyday life, light, shadow, and the small moments that make urban spaces interesting.

images.alt: Pedestrians walking on rain-soaked Great Marlborough Street in London with parked vans and historic buildings in black and white
Lone street lamp glowing on a winding road lined with trees under an overcast sky in muted blue tones
Dramatic black and white view down a narrow London mews with dark shadows framing a moody sky and distant street lamp
Motion-blurred crowd at Piccadilly Circus at night captured with long exposure on film
Rain-slicked London street at night with warm pub lights and coloured reflections on wet pavement
Looking up at apartment buildings from street level with golden sun flare and warm light leak on film
Magdalen College tower in Oxford framed by green trees against a bright blue sky with white clouds
Yellow Portuguese building with arched doorway at the end of a road as the sun sets behind green hills
Ornate Gothic turret and weather vane of an Oxford college building shot from below with deep teal sky
Red brick Victorian tower with round windows and pointed spire against a clear blue dusk sky
Man in a dark suit carrying a bag walking away down a London street with pedestrians in the background
Ornate wrought-iron street lantern surrounded by ivy and branches in front of a Georgian townhouse
Motion-blurred motorcyclist rounding a corner on a rainy London street in black and white with graffiti on the building
